game.name: Train Simulator: Western Maryland Railway Retro Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Western Maryland Railway Retro Pack, developed by High Iron Simulations, includes everything you need to step back in time to the late 1960s and early 1970s and go to work for the famed railroad that was nicknamed “The Wild Mary.”
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Western Maryland Railway Retro Pack, developed by High Iron Simulations, includes everything you need to step back in time to the late 1960s and early 1970s and go to work for the famed railroad that was nicknamed “The Wild Mary.”
